alert.note: Alert for Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 12:53PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Avant Mine near Oconee affecting Wilkinson and Washington Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Oconee River at Avant Mine near Oconee. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand into the woodlands and wetlands along the river upstream and downstream from a gage located by a dirt boat ramp on the west side of Avant Mine off Adams Road in Washington County. The water level will begin to surround the elevated USGS gage house. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 19.0 feet and falling slowly. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 AM EST Friday was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. late tonight at 100 AM EST.
